connectionToPtLawrence: Granddaughter of George Nelson and Diana Culver. Visited Alderbrook Farm as a child. Was flower girl (age 6) at aunt Lou's wedding there in 1902.

family.parents: Otis Henry "O.H." Culver and Mabel Gertrude Culver (Smith)
family.siblings: Leda Gertrude Culver, Mabel Florian Culver, Mary Luella Culver, Carroll N. Culver

timeline.event: Born November 11, 1895 in New Whatcom/Bellingham, WA
Flower girl at aunt Lou's wedding at Alderbrook
Photographed at Alderbrook Farm with siblings

miscellaneous: Later lived in Milwaukee, Wisconsin (per O.H. Culver's bio). Source of many family stories passed down about grandparents at Alderbrook.
researchQuestions: Who were Evelyn and Russell Watson's children?
notes: Short page with basic family info
